sn37.4:4.1: “Mendicants, when they have three qualities females—when their body breaks up, after death—are mostly reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.
sn37.4:4.3: A female lives at home with a heart full of the stain of stinginess in the morning, envy in the afternoon, and sexual desire in the evening.
sn37.4:4.6: When they have these three qualities females—when their body breaks up, after death—are mostly reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.”
